title: [娱乐] [[/]] Counter Strike —— 与YouCraft相同的CSGO游戏 [已汉化] [1.8-1.10]
author: 幻境雲達達
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 19:11 编辑 

该插件尚不完善，暂时停止更新，慎用
 Counter Strike - CS:GO 
 [BETA] 1.8-1.10 0.1.2b Counter Strike changes the whole aspect of Minecraft, with rounds and bombs, guns and much more!

Introduction 
Counter Strike is a gamemode that changes everything about Minecraft, adding the classic "Defuse" Counter Strike gamemode, where Terrorists gotta plant the bomb while Counter Terrorists should protect bomb sites, and defuse the bomb if it would be planted. More gamemodes are planned out for the future.
6
Requirements 
Counter Strike needs the following things to run properly. Things with an underline are "MUST-HAVE"'s for the plugin to even start.
HolographicDisplays
A map to play the game on
Config and positions set up (More about that under the "Setting up" section)

Setting up 
Before you can start playing the game, there are some things that needs to be clear and set up. That includes the following things:
Set up a lobby location (VIA In-game commands)
Set up spawn points for both teams (VIA In-game commands)
Place bedrock on the bomb-spots (Bombs are set to be placed on bedrock, you can ONLY place bombs on bedrock, this will be configurable in a later update).
Optionally mess around with the configuration to fit your needs.

Commands and Permissions 
/counterstrike (or /cs) - Main command for plugin. Permission: counterstrike.admin

Texture pack 
This feature is far from done, but I have taken some textures from the internet and added them to the Sphax PureBDCraft 128x128 texturepack, so that it actually looks like guns. In the future (I don't know when) there will be a proper texturepack for this plugin. If you wish to contribute by creating textures for items in the plugin, please feel free to do so and PM me here on spigot. Click here for the texturepack.

To-do features 
Multiple map support (Where players would vote for the map to play on).
Fully fledged texture/resource pack - I'm not sure when this will be done, as I will need someone else to make this for me.
More items (Grenades, Pistols, Snipers, Kevlar Vest and Helmet)
Recoil when firing with guns (Shake screen when shooting).
More gamemodes (Including Deathmatch, Hostages, etc..)
More configurable stuff, gun stats are already set up for it, but something like minimum players added to the maximum players would be nice, so its not an exact amount of people needed for every game. Commands for changing stuff would be pretty nice too.
An API for other developers to tweak the plugin.
Much more, but PLEASE suggest things that I can change, do better or add into the game so it makes for a better experience to play!

啊哈？是不是看不懂？上面来自Spigot发布介绍，下面由本人渣介绍。
Tested Minecraft Versions: 1.8  1.9  1.10

插件权限 
原帖只放出了一个管理权限 counterstrike.admin 我也没有具体测试过详细的子权限

插件命令 
/cs help - 帮助命令     /cs join <ID> - 加入游戏     /cs leave - 离开游戏     /cs reload - 重载     /cs delete <ID> - 删除游戏
/cs enable <ID> - 开启游戏     /cs disable <ID> - 关闭游戏     /cs create <ID> <name> <min_players> <max_players> - 创建游戏
<ID> = 游戏的特定代号，与名字无关     <name> = 名字      <min_players> = 最小游戏人数     <max_players> = 最大游戏人数

链接下载 
插件本体: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/counter-strike-cs-go-beta-1-8-1-10.27093/download?version=105689
汉化文件-ANSI:  http://pan.baidu.com/s/1pLpM74v     汉化文件-UTF8:  http://pan.baidu.com/s/1bo0egeN
